Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 34th minute
Ecuador was awarded a penalty kick in the second half but missed it
Kevin Rodríguez scored a goal for Ecuador in extra time to level the match
Argentina won the match 1-1 in a penalty shootout
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina is making a strong case to defend its title
Friday's match between Canada and Venezuela will be telling of what kind of trouble Argentina will have in the semifinal
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lionel Messi set the record for the most minutes played in Copa América history during the match
Others: The match was a defensive battle for most of the first half
Ecuador had a great chance for the game-winner in extra time but the attempt went just wide
